mapper.insert: insert into sss_deliveryreceipt (delivery_receipt_id, start_city, end_city, mid_city, make_date, state, comment) values (#{deliveryReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sss_deliveryreceipt set start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_city = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_date = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where delivery_receipt_id = #{deliveryReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select delivery_receipt_id, start_city, end_city, mid_city, make_date, state, comment from sss_deliveryreceipt
